title: Linux Container Internals: Lab 3: Container Runtime

steps.title: Topic 1 - Daemons & APIs: Docker, Kubernetes Master, Node, and their interaction with the Linux kernel
Topic 2 - System Calls & Kernel Namespaces: How they work inside of a container
Topic 3 - SELinux & sVirt: Dynamically generated contexts to protect your containers
Topic 4 - Cgroups: Dynamically created with container instantiation
Topic 5 - SECCOMP: Limiting how a containerized process can interact with the kernel
Topic 6 - Storage: How containers get local, copy on write storage
Topic 7 - Pod Networking: How individual containers and pods connect to the network
Topic 8 - Cluster Networking: How clusters of hosts manage the connections of containerized processes
